p: Chlorogenic acid, catechin, epicatechin, epigallocatechin, pro-anthocyanidins, and gallic acid have been identified in taro by thin-layer chromatography (TLC) and high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) [ 69]. Polyphenols represented by 1-O-feruloyl-D-glucoside; 3, 5-DiCQ acid; vitexin; isovitexin; cyanidin-3-glucoside; luteolin-7-O-ruti-noside; vicenin-2; caffeic acid; cyanidin-3-rhamnoside; chlorogenic acid; quercetin and hyperoside were identified by LC-MS (liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry) [ 76].
